title: Free Pizza Day 🍕
desc: Come grab a free slice and chill with friends at the library lawn!

title: Resume Workshop by Career Centre
desc: Get your CV reviewed and learn tips to land internships in Australia.

title: Industry Networking Night 🤝
desc: Connect with industry professionals and alumni. Formal attire required.

title: Tet Celebration 🧧
desc: Experience traditional games, food stalls, and lion dance at Swinburne HCMC.

title: Research Symposium 2025 📊
desc: Present your research projects and learn from faculty presentations. Open to all students.

title: Mid-Autumn Mooncake Party 🌕
desc: Lantern-making and free mooncakes in the student lounge.

title: Mental Health & Mindfulness Session
desc: De-stress with guided meditation. Open to all Swin students.

title: Faculty Coffee Chat ☕
desc: Informal discussion with faculty members about career paths and academic opportunities.

title: Coding Club Hackathon 💻
desc: Form teams and build something awesome in 24 hours! Pizza & prizes included.

title: Aussie BBQ Social 🍖
desc: Join us for sausages, music, and new mates! Free for all Swinburne students.

title: Graduate School Information Session 🎓
desc: Learn about postgraduate opportunities, scholarships, and application processes.

title: IELTS Speaking Practice Circle 🇬🇧
desc: Casual English speaking sessions hosted by international tutors.

title: Innovation Lab Open Day 🔬
desc: Explore cutting-edge research facilities and meet our research teams.

title: Startup Pitch Night 🚀
desc: Pitch your idea to a panel of real VCs and tech mentors. RSVP required.

title: Anime Club Cosplay Night 🎭
desc: Dress as your favorite character! Snacks, karaoke, and fan voting.

title: International Student Welcome Lunch 🌍
desc: Meet fellow international students and learn about support services available.
